message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,500,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal.  While your offer is appreciated, $1,200,000 is below its true value. I could consider $1,400,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, it seems we're getting closer. To meet you halfway, I'd be willing to accept $1,325,000.  This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,300,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
